text.p: National TechTeam Inc said Monday it completed the purchase of the remaining shares of WebCentric Communications Inc of Omaha, Nebraska.

TechTeam's original investment of $775,000 in cash was made in September 1996 for 15 percent of WebCentric's shares. The remaining 85 percent of the shares were acquired for a combination of stock and cash totaling $6,149,000, bringing the total cost of the acquisition to $6.9 million.
WebCentric develops Internet-initiated call center and technical support for a range of business and consumer applications.
National TechTeam provides information technology outsourcing to multi-national corporations, government agencies and service organizations.
